comment.author: 13175590@N00
comment._content:
I hope that records.nsw has this captioned correctly.  My memory is of something much smaller and less ornate.  It could have been another to have space excised during its lifetime, but the whole station building wasn't large or grand.
I had 'dinner' there once in the 1980s, towards the end of North Coast Mail: classic takeaway pie and coffee.

Roderick B Smith
Rail News Victoria Editor
